forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. North wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a serene clarity, the sun casting an inviting glow across the cityscape. Temperatures hover around a mild 55 degrees, complemented by a gentle north wind that carries a touch of crispness. The sky, unmarred by the usual fog that often blankets the coastal regions, offers an expansive view of the Golden Gate and beyond, accentuating the rolling hills and the myriad rooftops below. As the day progresses towards evening, the air will cool slightly to a refreshing embrace, dipping to around 42 degrees, but it’s expected to hold the promise of a clear night.

For those venturing into the streets or perhaps taking in the splendid vistas from one of the many hills, layered clothing will be the wisest choice. A light jacket or cardigan would suffice against the temperate chill without stifling the spirit of the clear day. The broad-reaching views make it an opportune time for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet moment at a sidewalk café, where one can savor the essence of the city, enjoy a warm drink, and indulge in the simple pleasure of people-watching. With the day winding into a peaceful evening, San Francisco invites you to embrace its beauty, unhindered by the fog, as life hums quietly around you.
